# tf.app.run

### `tf.app.run`

```
tf.app.run(main=None, argv=None)
```


Runs the program with an optional 'main' function and 'argv' list.

Defined in [`tensorflow/python/platform/app.py`](https://www.tensorflow.org/code/tensorflow/python/platform/app.py).
